title: Software Engineer
description:
*Vill du göra samhällsnytta och bidra till Sveriges oberoende i världen? Vi söker nu en teknisk rockstar som är vass på Java och inte blir avskräckt av riktigt stora datamängder. Du är alltid hungrig på nya kunskaper och vill använda din dyrbara tid till att göra Sverige säkrare. På FRA arbetar vi med unika uppgifter – för Sveriges säkerhet och integritet.*
**Ditt uppdrag**
 I rollen som Software Engineer utvecklar och underhåller du lösningar som tolkar, bearbetar och lagrar stora mängder inhämtad data. Vidare utvecklar du även användarapplikationer som gör data tillgänglig för användning i verksamhetens underrättelseproduktion. Världen förändras och så även vårt data. Därför sker kontinuerlig utveckling i takt med att nya krav och behov uppstår.
   

  

 Du kommer att ingå i ett team med helhetsansvar för sina system. Teamet jobbar agilt med eget ansvar för utveckling och drift av hela stacken.
   

  

 Teamet har ett nära samarbete med andra delar inom produktionen av analys och bearbetningsförmågor. Både med slutanvändare och andra tekniska team som förser systemet med data.
   

  

 Vi strävar alltid efter att våra medarbetare ska trivas och utvecklas. Vi ser det som en förutsättning för teamets effektivitet. Via utbildningar, konferenser och egen omvärldsbevakning håller vi oss uppdaterade på den senaste tekniken. Tillsammans utvärderar vi och tar del av varandras insikter.
   

  

**Du kan**
**Du Har Följande Kompetens/erfarenhet**
* Goda kunskaper i Java
* JavaScript / TypeScript
* Högskoleutbildning inom datateknik, systemvetenskap eller motsvarande alternativt förvärvat motsvarande kompetens genom arbetslivserfarenhet
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i såväl tal som skrift


 För Oss Är Det Viktigt Att Du Är Nyfiken, Ödmjuk, Har Ett Driv Att Lära Dig Nya Saker. Det Är Även Meriterande För Tjänsten Om Du Har Erfarenhet Från Ett Eller Flera Av Följande Områden
   

  

* Big Data
* Iceberg / Delta Lake
* Relationsdatabaser
* NoSQL-databaser
* Spark
* Trino
* Angular
* Linux
* Kubernetes / Docker
* Informationsmodellering/Datamodellering


**Du är**
 Vi kommer lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper. Därför tror vi att du till din natur är nyfiken på nya tekniker och håller dig uppdaterad om vad som händer, både vad gäller arbetsmetoder och nya produkter. Du delar entusiastiskt med dig av dina kunskaper och lockas av möjligheten att vara med och påverka framtida teknikval och lösningar. Dessutom tycker du det är spännande och känner en stolthet i att få vara med och bygga utökad underrättelseförmåga för FRA.
   

  

**Om FRA**
 FRA har omvärlden som sin arena där varje arbetsuppgift är en del av något större. På ett eller annat sätt får du som medarbetare vara med och bidra till att skydda Sveriges integritet och oberoende i världen. Du är med och gör skillnad på riktigt, varje dag.
   

  

 Vår uppgift som underrättelsetjänst är att skydda Sverige mot de allvarligaste hot som kan riktas mot ett samhälle – militära angrepp, terrorism och cyberattacker. Vi skyddar det viktigaste vi har – vår trygghet, vår demokrati och vårt sätt att leva. Vi är experter på cyberområdet och signalspaning samt en larmklocka för militära hot.
   

  

 FRA leder sedan 2024 Nationellt cybersäkerhetscenter, NCSC vars uppdrag är att utveckla och stärka Sveriges förmåga att förebygga, upptäcka och hantera cyberhot.
   

  

 Som nyanställd på FRA får du en omfattande introduktionsutbildning och kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling, vilket ger dig möjlighet att utveckla dina färdigheter och bli ännu bättre på det du brinner för. Vår organisation är mångfacetterad och består av olika kompetenser och personligheter, där varje individ har unika egenskaper och förutsättningar. Vi strävar efter att skapa en miljö där alla känner sig välkomna och trygga. Utöver en stimulerande arbetsmiljö erbjuder vi också ett attraktivt förmånspaket, som du kan läsa mer om på www.fra.se . För mer information om Nationellt cybersäkerhetscenter besök www.ncsc.se
   

  

 För din trygghet. För vår demokrati. Varje dag. Året om.
   

  

**Mer information**
 Arbetsplatsen är belägen i närheten av Drottningholm, ca 10 min från Brommaplan. Svenskt medborgarskap är ett krav då anställning vid FRA innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Ett krav för att få anställning är godkänd säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll. Säkerhetsprövningen kommer att genomföras i enlighet med bestämmelser i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. Vi tillämpar sex månaders provanställning. För mer information är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef på nummer 010-557 49 53. Fackliga företrädare nås på 010-557 46 00.
   

  

 Vi tar emot ansökningar via www.fra.se
 **senast 2025-09-28**
 Referensnummer
 **2024FRA2158-3** 
 .
   

  

 Då vi inför denna rekrytering redan tagit ställning till de rekryteringskanaler vi önskar använda undanber vi oss att bli kontaktade för ytterligare erbjudanden om annonserings- och rekryteringshjälp.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About Us**
 At Medius, we believe managing finance should be about strategy, not stress. That same mindset shapes not only the solutions we build, but also the culture we create for our people. We remove complexity, embrace innovation, and give our teams the freedom to focus on what truly matters — whether that’s transforming the future of finance with AI or finding balance to go home on time.
   

  

 Founded in Sweden in 2001, Medius has grown from a local startup into a global leader in cloud-based spend management solutions. Today, thousands of organizations worldwide trust us to simplify accounts payable and spend management processes. Our journey has been driven by continuous innovation, a passion for technology, and above all — the people who make it happen.
   

  

 We’re more than a software company. We’re a team of problem-solvers, innovators and collaborators working together to reinvent the category of accounts payable. Our solutions use Artificial Intelligence to eliminate manual work, bring clarity, confidence, and control, and empower finance teams of the future.
   

  

**At Medius,** 
 our values guide how we work and grow together:
   

  

* Connect – We believe in the power of people—individually and collectively—and our success depends on understanding and respecting each other. We appreciate that ‘empowering finance teams of the future’ is an exciting endeavor, and we share it with everyone around us.
* Question – We enjoy the challenge of our work and the thrill of collaboration. We are not afraid to question ourselves and each other because we believe diverse perspectives can lead to better outcomes and that there is great power in resolution.
* Own – We are thorough, thoughtful, and decisive. We anticipate what’s next, what a customer might need, and then we deliver. That’s how we get things done. And that’s how we remain a leader. Customers trust us to do our job so that they can focus on what they do best.


 At Medius, you’ll join a diverse, global community where curiosity is celebrated, ideas matter, and innovation never stops. If you’re passionate about technology, eager to make an impact, and ready to grow alongside a team that lives its values, Medius is where you can do your best work — and still have time to live your best life.
   

  

 Lear more at www.medius.com
   

  

**Job Overview**
 We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer, Tech Lead, or Architect with a proven track record in building and operating cloud-native systems. The ideal candidate is an analytical problem-solver who thrives in debugging complex, distributed applications in production and is passionate about creating secure, reliable, and scalable solutions.
   

  

**Responsibilities And Duties**
* Design, develop, and operate cloud-native applications with a focus on automation and observability.
* Debug and troubleshoot complex distributed applications in production environments.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams in an agile development environment.
* Ensure system reliability, security, and scalability are maintained across all applications.
* Contribute to architectural decisions and technology strategy, particularly around cloud-native solutions.


**Qualifications**
* Proven experience as a Senior Software Engineer, Tech Lead, or Architect.
* Strong proficiency in C# and .NET.
* Hands-on experience with cloud-native solutions, ideally including Service Fabric, AKS, Azure Storage, and Elasticsearch.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills for complex distributed systems.
* Familiarity with agile methodologies and cross-functional team collaboration.
* Passion for architecture, security, reliability, and scalability, with experience designing for automation and observability.

title: Engineering Manager
description:
*Mojang Studios is best known as the creators of Minecraft, but we’re also on a mission* 
*–* 
*to build a better world through the power of play.*
*Why play? Well, play is at the heart of everything we do. It’s the blocky backbone of our games, the core of our development philosophy, and even the origin of our name. From the relentless experimentation of our endlessly inspiring community to the classrooms where Minecraft has become an essential teaching tool, play is the bedrock of our existence.*
 The Gameplay Systems team is looking for an Engineering Manager to be part of our team in Stockholm managing a group of software engineers who build the platform that powers a diverse set of Minecraft gaming experiences.
   

  

 In this role, you will support your team in developing high engineering standards which support a smooth flow of work and a healthy work environment for your team members. You will also support your engineers in their growth while advocating and acting as a role model for our values.
   

  

 You will take end-to-end accountability of adding new features through your team, supporting them in evaluating requirements, designing solutions, estimating development, and integrating high quality features into our products. You will help shape the creation experience and will be responsible for features visible to all Minecraft creators and players.
   

  

**Here are some examples of what your tasks might be:**
* Hiring, coaching and growing engineers, ensuring the right skill set and attitude.
* Creating a high performing culture based on trust.
* Taking an active part in the tech strategy for your area and advocating great engineering practices as well as continuous improvement.
* Partnering closely with the team’s Product Manager and engineers to ensure alignment on goals and plans.
* Guiding the team to design elegant solutions which result in simple, extensible, and maintainable code. Coaching the team on implementation and release at quality.
* Optimizing team processes for productivity, responsiveness to feedback, and collaboration.


  

  

**Requirements** 
  

  

* You enjoy leading and developing people and have a track record doing it
* You are knowledgeable and passionate about software development, and have experience working as an engineer yourself (with modern C++, preferably on game platforms or client applications)
* You have experience working in an agile development environment, and the engineering practices which make this work
* You have experience working with a diverse set of stakeholders and can represent both possibilities and challenges in technical choices
* You have experience helping teams to deliver timely, high-quality products
* Passion for learning and sharing knowledge with your team and the organisation
* Strong communication skills
* Excellent teamwork skills and an eagerness to reach goals in a collaborative manner


 This is a full-time role based in Stockholm with a hybrid remote working model that requires you to be onsite every week. You'll collaborate closely with our studio colleagues in Redmond, USA, and across various disciplines. This position has off hour meetings mainly with West coast USA representatives.
   

  

**Mojang Studios**
*Mojang Studios is a Microsoft-owned game developer. The company was founded in Stockholm, Sweden and has offices around the world, including Stockholm, Redmond, Tokyo, London, and Shanghai. We’re always working on new and exciting ways to expand the Minecraft universe.*
*Our community is global and incredibly diverse. We keep this in mind when developing anything, as we want people to feel included in Minecraft. And in recruiting, our goal is to make Mojang Studios as diverse as our community.*
*We got started as a tiny indie developer, and part of our culture still reflects that heritage. But we’re also proud to belong to Xbox Game Studios, which creates unique opportunities to grow and develop.*
*To help us achieve amazing things, we have built an equally amazing studio space. Situated right on the water by Söder Mälarstrand, it’s filled to the brim with all the tools, toys and caffeine required to create world-class entertainment.*
*But in the end, it’s the people of Mojang Studios that make this place truly special. When you join, you’ll find yourself in the company of incredibly bright, warm, and creative individuals – all united and working toward a single goal. Come help us reach it!*
***Important note on resumes**
 Please make sure that
 **all** 
 the information in your resume is accurate because we will conduct a thorough background check. Any discrepancies will lower your chances of getting to the next interview stage and we’d hate to miss out on an awesome candidate! Double check that any gap years are reflected in your history, and that your education and work experience are completely accurate. Good luck!*

title: Software Developer
description:
TRATON is a group of strong brands with a shared mission: transforming transportation together to create the future of sustainable transport solutions. Within TRATON, we include MAN, Scania, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International. As part of a global team of industry experts, you get to think bigger, experience more, and reach further. Together, we have the power to transform transportation.
   

  

 Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do!
   

  

 We are seeking a skilled Python Developer with 3–5 years of experience, focusing on backend development of test- and integration solutions for automotive and embedded software applications. This role requires strong problem-solving skills, collaboration in cross-functional teams, and the ability to work in a dynamic environment.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
 Python developer who is involved in building and maintaining robust SW testing frameworks to support the development of complex SW systems and embedded solutions
   

  

 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate and configure software for automotive ECU applications
   

  

 Develop and optimize Test Environments as a service(TEaaS), provide HIL test environment
   

  

 Connect the SW solution configuration tools to test environments
   

  

**Key Competence**
 Polyglot Programming: Full proficiency in Python with hands-on backend development experience, complemented by strong ability to understand and work with other languages such as C++ and C# for embedded and low-level systems programming.
   

  

 Software Engineering Principles: Familiarity with software design patterns, SOLID principles, test-driven development (TDD), and clean code practices for building maintainable and scalable solutions.
   

  

 Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering or related field
   

  

 Experience with real-time operating system and real-time communication protocols(e.g CAN and Ethernet)
   

  

 Version Control & CI/CD: Solid understanding of version control principles with Git (GitLab or similar) and experience in setting up and maintaining CI/CD pipelines
   

  

 SW testing and test environments: Practical knowledge of test platforms/test environments tailored for embedded and/or automotive systems
   

  

**Nice to Have**
 Cloud & DevOps Tools: Familiarity with AWS, Docker, and JFrog repository management for deliveries.
   

  

 Version Control Alternatives: Familiarity with Perforce.
   

  

 Agile Ways of Working: Experience working in Agile frameworks, including Scrum and SAFe.
   

  

 Hardware Interaction: Experience working with test hardware, particularly involving communication protocols to control and monitor hardware.
   

  

 HIL & SIL Test Automation: Experience with hardware-in-the-loop (HIL) and software-in-the-loop (SIL) setups, including integration of ECUs and automated regression testing.
   

  

 Automotive Standards: Knowledge of automotive communication and diagnostic standards.
   

  

 System-Level Debugging: Ability to troubleshoot across framework, hardware interface, communication protocols, and embedded SW.
   

  

**We Offer**
 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, TRATON Group R&D supports your career growth both locally and internationally. Benefits include wellness allowance, TRATON result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. We also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes. Apply as soon as possible. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role. If you have questions or would like more information, please contact frida.stam@scania.com.
   

  

 We look forward to your application!

title: Game Developer Intern
description:
**About the Internship** 





 Are you passionate about game development and excited to contribute to a next-gen, AI-powered shooter game?
 




  






 Realdini Studios is looking for Game Developer Interns who are eager to gain hands-on experience using Unreal Engine 5 and want to play a role in shaping a visually stunning and narratively rich multiplayer game. This is an excellent opportunity to grow your skills, collaborate with a creative team, and build your portfolio with real-world development experience.
 




  





**What You’ll Do** 



* Work directly in Unreal Engine 5 to develop core gameplay mechanics, multiplayer systems, and AI integrations.
* Collaborate with artists, designers, and AI specialists to bring game features to life.
* Use GitHub for version control and team-based collaboration.
* Optimize game systems for performance and player experience.
* Participate in regular brainstorming and sprint meetings to help shape the game's direction.



  





**Must-Have Skills** 



* Knowledge of Unreal Engine 5 and Blueprint scripting.
* Familiarity with interfaces and how to implement them within game systems.
* Basic understanding of game mechanics, physics, and AI behaviours.
* A strong desire to learn and contribute to real-world game development projects.
* Ability to work collaboratively within a creative and dynamic team.
* Familiarity with GitHub and version control best practices.



  





**Nice-to-Haves** 



* Experience integrating AI or procedural storytelling features.
* Exposure to multiplayer networking and replication in UE5.
* Background in game design, UI, or VFX.



  





**What We Offer** 



* A chance to work on a ground-breaking multiplayer shooter game from the early stages.
* Portfolio-building opportunities with real contributions to a functioning game project.
* A flexible, remote-friendly internship built around your availability.
* Mentorship and collaboration with game artists, developers, and designers.
* Workshops to help you grow and improve your technical and creative skills.
* A Certificate of Completion and professional reference upon successful participation.



  





**Important Note** 





 🚨 This is an unpaid internship focused on skill enhancement, professional growth, and portfolio development at an early-stage start-up. Please only apply if you're comfortable with this arrangement.
 





 Ready to code the future of gaming with us? Apply now and help shape something truly innovative.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Senior software engineer (backend) - 6 month project (potential extension) - Full time - Stockholm
 



  





 We’re looking for a seasoned backend engineer who thrives in technical ambiguity and working across the full engineering lifecycle, from solving complex API challenges, to seamless integrations with customer platforms.
 



  





 This isn’t your typical backend role. Yes, you'll write code but your real impact will come from untangling complexity, aligning teams, and driving technical clarity across multiple layers of the stack and organization.
 



  





 🚀 What You'll Do
 


* Lead technical initiatives end-to-end, from scoping to deployment
* Work hand-in-hand with product managers, external partners, and internal stakeholders
* Own integrations with a wide range of third-party APIs and hardware devices
* Navigate complex cloud infrastructure and distributed systems
* Bring structure and clarity to fast-moving, ambiguous environment



  





 This role is deeply backend-focused, but it touches systems-level thinking, infrastructure, and real-world connected devices - working on:
 



  




* API design and integration
* Distributed systems and cloud operations
* Automation and data pipelines
* Real-world, IoT-scale device integrations (think: solar panels, EV chargers, batteries — all speaking different languages)



  





 🛠 Our Stack - We're tech-agnostic when it makes sense, but here’s what you’ll mostly work with:
 


* Golang (must-have)
* AWS (our primary production cloud) – Lambda, RDS, IoT Core, and more
* GCP (mostly on the analytics and data side) – Cloud Run, BigQuery, Python
* MQTT and other protocols for IoT



  





  





 🧠 Who We're Looking For You’re a good fit if you:
 



  




* Have experience at the Staff, Principal, or very Senior Engineer level
* Have worked in
 
 startups or high-growth environments
* Are comfortable owning complex technical projects from idea to production
* Know how to collaborate across function, especially with product and external technical teams
* Love diving into murky, layered systems and driving towards clarity
* Bring a high level of technical ownership and curiosity



  





 A really exciting project and an opportunity to work with some top engineers in a fast-paced and energetic environment. The role is office-first, although there is flexibility as and when needed.
 



  





 Unfortunately unable to assist with visa sponsorship or relocation at this point.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Tom är Sveriges största tjänsteförmedling för bygg, flytt och städ. Genom vår portfölj av varumärken, som Offerta, IPIS och Svenska Eljouren, skapar vi transparens och tar bort hinder - vi gör det helt enkelt lättare att hitta pålitliga hantverkare.
   

  

 Vi är i startgroparna för att bygga en ny plattform som gör det möjligt för oss att utveckla snabbare, integrera smartare och bygga fantastiska upplevelser för våra kunder. Du blir en del av ett litet team som med stöd av resten av organisationen jobbar nära med kunder och vågar experimentera och styras av vad som fungerar och vad som inte funkar.
   

  

**Din roll**
* Du är drivande i att designa och bygga en ny plattform med både användare och AI-agenter som kunder.
* Du bygger en plattform som möjliggör snabba leveranser och att enkelt kasta det som inte funkar.
* Du bygger features och användarupplevelser för tusentals användare.
* Du strukturerar och bygger API:er, integrationer och MCPs.
* Du arbetar produktnära med kunder, PM:s och designers.


**Vad vi söker**
* Du har tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta som Software Engineer på ett produktbolag.
* Du har en akademisk examen inom till exempel datavetenskap.
* Du är inte rädd att röra dig mellan frontend och backend och har erfarenhet av att bygga i .NET eller TypeScript med Node.js, och React.
* Du har erfarenhet av att bygga API:er och gränssnitt för modulära system.
* Du är pragmatisk och vet när det är rätt att bygga snabbt och när det är bättre att bygga långsiktigt.
* Du är en prestigelös, initiativtagande lagspelare som hugger i där det krävs och vill förstå varför och vem du bygger för.


**Varför Tom**
* Du får jobba på ett lönsamt, snabbt växande företag samtidigt som du bygger något nytt från grunden.
* Din kod går live snabbt och påverkar tusentals användare direkt.
* Du är en del av ett litet team, utan hierarkier eller tidskrävande godkännandeprocesser.
* Du väljer tillsammans med ditt team vilka verktyg ni behöver för att lyckas.


 För att trivas hos oss tror vi att du är hjälpsam, pragmatisk och värdesätter farten hos ett entreprenöriellt bolag. Det spelar mindre roll om du inte checkar alla boxar eller är i början av din karriär - vi lägger mycket vikt vid initiativförmåga och känsla för vad som gör en bra produkt. På Tom vill vi skapa en kultur där våra användare är i centrum. Vi värdesätter transparens, prestigelöshet och att få saker gjorda.
   

  

 Vi arbetar på kontoret, antingen i Stockholm eller Uppsala. Tjänsten utgår främst från Stockholmskontoret som ligger i nyrenoverade lokaler precis ovanpå centralstationen.
   

  

**Förmåner**
* Generöst friskvårdsbidrag.
* 30 semesterdagar.
* Frukost på kontoret varje vecka.
* Nyrenoverat kontor i centrala Stockholm.


 Bra att veta
   

  

 Tillträde: Snarast eller enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Arbetstid: Heltid
   

  

 Arbetsort: Stockholm
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdatum: Urval och intervjuer sker löpande.
   

  

 För frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Johan Liedgren via mejl (förnamn.efternamn@tom.se).
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Senior Software Developer
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
**About the company** 




 Bromma is the industry's most experienced spreader manufacturer, known worldwide for crane spreaders of exceptional reliability. In all, more than 20,000 crane spreaders and rotators have been put into service since the 1960's. Today, Bromma manufactures close to 2,000 spreaders of all types per year. In fact, anywhere you go, if you work where containers are transported, you're likely to see a Bromma spreader in action.
 



  





 Bromma offers a dynamic and international work environment where employees are empowered to innovate and grow. They value collaboration, customer commitment, and continuous improvement. By joining Bromma, candidates will contribute to the development of smarter and more sustainable global trade solutions. More information about Bromma can be found at
 
 www.bromma.com
 
 .
 



  





 At Bromma, they offer an inspiring international atmosphere where you can thrive and grow your career. You will work on the full diagnostic lifecycle, from machine to user interface, and develop software for their telematic units, which is a key component in Bromma’s digitalization strategy. Join the innovative team at Bromma and take the lead in the digitalization of the cargo handling industry as a Software Developer in their Kista, Stockholm office.
 



  





**What Bromma Offers** 



* Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
* A comprehensive benefits package focused on health and wellbeing.
* Flexible work arrangements, including hybrid work.
* Thorough training, development opportunities, and career growth.
* The chance to shape the future of cargo handling in a meaningful way.



  





**Tasks and Responsibilities** 




 As a Senior Software Developer at Bromma, you will work closely with our R&D Cloud and Diagnostics team, in cooperation with internal stakeholders and external vendors. You will be responsible for the development and maintenance of Bromma’s diagnostic and cloud platforms, including onboard diagnostics, prognostics, and telematics software.
 



 Our team has taken a strategic decision to own our platforms and moved all source code in house. This gives you the opportunity to work with interesting and challenging technology, and develop your skills in all technologies included in full stack development. You will be a key contributor to Bromma's digitalization strategy, helping to shape the future of the cargo handling industry.
 



  





**What You’ll Be Doing** 



* Developing and maintaining Bromma’s diagnostic and cloud platforms, including onboard diagnostics, prognostics, and telematics software
* Taking part in the full diagnostic lifecycle, from machine data to user interface
* Supporting Bromma’s strategic shift to in-house platform ownership, working across the full technology stack
* Contributing to Bromma’s digitalization strategy by delivering innovative, scalable, and reliable software solutions
* Play a key role in shaping future technology for cargo handling equipment



  





**Education, experience and personal characteristics** 



* A degree in computer science or equivalent hands-on experience
* Experience with DevOps, AWS, and PostgreSQL or similar databases
* Strong knowledge of Spring Boot and/or Node.js
* Proficiency in Linux, C++, or Java
* Fluency in English and Swedish, both spoken and written, is required
* Experience and/or keen inerest in leadership and mentoring is meritorious, aiming to take on greater responsibility as a natural next step in your career



  





 You are highly driven and take full ownership of your work. With a strong sense of responsibility, you don’t wait for perfect instructions - instead, you take initiative and tackle tasks proactively. You are solution-oriented and committed to delivering high-quality results, always aiming to move things forward. Your curiosity and collaborative mindset make you an asset in team settings, and your ability to see the bigger picture ensures that you contribute meaningfully to both immediate tasks and long-term goals.
 



  





**Additional Information** 



* Start: Upon agreement
* Location: Kista, Stockholm
* Salary: Upon agreement


- 


 This position is a direct recruitment, meaning the recruitment process is managed by Bravura, and you will be hired directly by Bromma (part of Kalmar Solutions).
 



  





 Questions about Bravura's recruitment process? You can find answers to the most frequently asked questions here:
 
 https://www.bravura.se/karriar/
 




  





 If you have any questions or inquiries, feel free to reach out to our recruitment manager, Julia, at julia.paulin@bravura.se. We recommend that you submit your application immediately as we make a continuous selection.
 



  





 Welcome with your application!
 



  





 #Brillante

title: Business Intelligence Developer
description:
**Job Title: BI Developer** 




**Location: Stockholm, Sweden - Hybrid: 3 Days to Office Every Week** 




**Duration: 6 Months (Extendable)** 




**Employment Type: Contract B2B** 




  





**Roles & Responsibilities:** 




 We are looking for a Data Warehouse Consultant to join our team. You will help design, develop, and maintain ETL processes, and support our data warehouse environment. You will collaborate closely with other data engineers and analysts to ensure high quality data delivery in an Agile environment.
 



**Who You Are:** 




 Experienced with Teradata and Oracle Data Integrator (ODI).
 



 Skilled in ETL development and maintenance.
 



 Familiar with Agile ceremonies (stand-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives) and PI planning.
 



 Passionate about improving processes and enabling teams to work efficiently.
 



 Collaborative and open to sharing knowledge in a caring team environment.

title: Senior Fullstack Developer (Java/Javascript)
description:
**Välkommen till B3 Innovation – där teknik och trivsel går hand i hand!**
 Välkommen till B3 Innovation, hjärtat av systemutveckling inom B3 Consulting Group! Här kombinerar vi den familjära känslan från ett småföretag med storbolagets resurser.
   

  

 Vi är ett engagerat gäng med konsulter som specialiserar oss på systemutveckling inom Java och moderna JavaScriptramverk. I en miljö där du får möjlighet att växa både professionellt och personligt i en inkluderande gemenskap. Oavsett om du är en passionerad cyklist eller en bokslukare, så finns det plats för dig hos oss.
   

  

**Om rollen som fullstackutvecklare inom Java/** 
 Javascript på B3 Innovation
   

  

 Som Senior fullstackutvecklare hos oss kommer du att:
   

  

* utveckla högkvalitativa och skalbara lösningar
* samarbeta med ett tvärfunktionellt team av experter
* Delta i design och arkitektur av nya system.


**Om dig**
 Vi söker dig som har god erfarenhet och arbetat i fullstackrollen under en längre tid. Du som har hunnit både göra misstag och även lära av dem. Förhoppningsvis tycker du om att arbeta i team, dela med dig av dina kunskaper och vill fortsätta att lära dig nytt.
   

  

 Våra krav för att du ska passa i denna roll:
   

  

* Du behärskar svenska i tal och skrift.
* Du har minst 5 års erfarenhet av utvecklarrollen.
* Du har god kunskap att jobba med Java, Javascript, Kotlin, Spring, Microservices.
* Du har god kunskap att jobba med olika ramverk som React, Angular och Vue.
* Du har erfarenhet av att jobba i agila team.


**Varför B3 Innovation?**
* Innovativ Kultur: Vi uppmuntrar kreativitet och nya idéer.
* Inkluderande miljö: Vi värdesätter mångfald och strävar efter en arbetsplats där alla känner sig välkomna.
* Balans och flexibilitet: Flexibilitet är centralt, vilket gör att du kan forma din arbetsdag för att få livspusslet att gå ihop. Vi förstår vikten av balans mellan arbete och fritid och erbjuder därför flexibla arbetstider.
* Gemenskap: Hos oss blir du en del av ett stöttande team som arbetar tillsammans för att nå gemensamma mål. Det handlar inte bara om “jobb jobb jobb” hos oss. Vi anordnar allt från tech-workshops till sociala aktiviteter som stickcaféer, spelkvällar och AW.


**Om B3 Innovation**
 Vi är kända för vårt fokus på innovation och förmåga att leverera värde till våra kunder. Genom att kombinera djup teknisk expertis med en stark förståelse för våra kunders verksamhet, skapar vi lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad. Vår kultur bygger på öppenhet, samarbete och en passion för teknik.
   

  

 Vi prioriterar personlig utveckling och erbjuder verktyg som B3 Academy, TechTalks och "Lunch & Learn" för att du ska kunna växa.
   

  

 Upptäck möjligheterna med B3 Innovation. Som utvecklare får du arbeta inom spännande branscher som media, bank och finans, energi, offentlig sektor, telekom och e-handel. Oavsett om du optimerar TV-sändningar, utvecklar digitala banktjänster eller skapar smarta hem, hjälper vi dig att hitta det perfekta uppdraget som matchar dina intressen.
   

  

 Våra toppbetyg i medarbetarundersökningar visar att nöjda kollegor är kärnan i vår framgång. Är du redo att kliva in i en miljö där utveckling och trivsel går hand i hand?
   

  

 Som sagt, välkommen till B3 Innovation – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Är du redo att ta nästa steg?**
 Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt engagerade och innovativa team!
   

  

 Om du är mer nyfiken på oss så kan du läsa mer om oss här: https://www.b3.se/innovation
   

  

 Om du har funderingar så hör gärna av dig till Kenneth Andersson på +46706678050 alt mail kenneth.andersson@b3.se.

title: 5G Core Developer
description:
Swedium Global Services is the growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.
 



  





  





 Job Name: 5g Core Developer
 



 Location: Kista, Sweden- Onsite
 



 Experience- 7 to 12 years
 



  





 Role and Responsibilities
 


* Several years of experience in development within 5G Core (preferably also 4G/EPC).
* Deep understanding of network flows in 5G Core (AMF, SMF, UPF, NRF, PCF).
* Experience in developing Virtual Network Functions (VNF/CNF).
* Strong programming background, e.g. C/C++, Java, or Go.
* Knowledge of relevant protocols: HTTP/2, SCTP, Diameter, PFCP, gRPC.
* Experience in cloud-native environments: Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD.
* Ability to independently analyze, develop, and troubleshoot network functions.

title: Senior Fullstack Developer - Node
description:
**At Hemnet, we're in the midst of an exciting transformation — rebalancing our tech stack to better support the future of our products and teams. As part of this journey, we’re starting to expand our tech stack from our existing Ruby-based architecture to modern, scalable services built with Node.js.** 
  

  

 To accelerate this shift and strengthen our capabilities, we’re now investing in growing by hiring additional Node.js developers.
   

  

**What’s in it for you?** 
  

  

* 🧪 Innovative Approach: Work with an experimental and iterative approach. Dare to explore uncharted territories, try something new, and surprise us all!
* 🔄 End-to-End Development: Develop and maintain our products from idea to production
* 🫂 Inclusive Culture: Enjoy a friendly, inclusive, and caring company culture where transparency, work-life balance, and well-being are high priorities. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, ethnicity, or background
* ⚗️ Lab Weeks: Participate in recurring lab weeks—time for our developers to experiment, hack around, and evaluate creative ideas. Unleash Your Inner Mad Scientist—innovation starts here!
* 🛠️ Autonomy: Be part of a team that controls its own product decisions


  

  

**What you will do:** 
  

  

* Contribute to the continuous improvement of existing products and the development of new ones within the product team
* Collaborate closely with designers, product managers, and stakeholders to shape product vision and technical direction
* Participate in discussions and decisions related to architecture, implementation, and prioritization
* Take ownership of code quality, performance, and maintainability through testing, reviews, and refactoring
* Support and maintain production systems, ensuring reliability and stability
* Foster strong cross-functional relationships and actively contribute to a collaborative team culture
* Node.js Journey: Play a central role in our Node.js journey. While we have some services already running in production, this is just the beginning


  

  

**We believe you are:** 
  

  

 We see that you are an experienced developer with documented, commercial experience of working with the Node ecosystem. As our current architecture still includes Ruby components, we think that you are willing to learn and navigate the Ruby code base.
   

  

* Experience from data-driven product development with short iterations and experimentation
* Team Collaboration: Experience working in team settings, especially in medium to large multicultural/global companies
* Extensive experience and proficiency with other programming languages and eco systems. Meritorious frameworks: NestJS, Ruby on Rails, Typescript, React, and Next.js


  

  

**Your technical expertise likely includes several of the following areas:** 
  

  

* JavaScript – Proficiency in ES5, ES6+, and asynchronous programming
* Node.js – In-depth knowledge of Node.js and its ecosystem and frameworks (e.g., NestJS)
* Web Applications – Proven experience in driving architecture and system design, as well as developing and maintaining complex web-based applications in production environments
* RESTful APIs – Experience in designing and implementing RESTful APIs
* GraphQL – Familiarity with best practices for implementing and maintaining GraphQL APIs
* Database Management – Proficiency with relational databases such as PostgreSQL
* Cloud Services – Familiarity with AWS, Docker, and CircleCI, including deployment and scaling of Node.js services in cloud environments
* Testing and Debugging – Skilled in testing and debugging Node.js applications to ensure performance and reliabilit


  

  

**🏡 Your career at Hemnet** 
  

  

 With over 40 million visits each month, you’ll be part of Sweden’s most popular property platform – and one of the world’s most admired real estate platforms. But our size and reputation aren’t the only reasons why you and your 150+ colleagues enjoy working here.
   

  

 Since 1998, Hemnet has been an essential go-to place for millions of Swedes, guiding them through one of life’s biggest transitions: finding a new place to call home. We’re proud to make this life-changing, often stressful journey as seamless as possible.
   

  

 With access to vast amounts of data, you’ll have limitless opportunities to explore and create new features that enhance the experience for Sweden’s real estate agents, home buyers, and sellers.
   

  

 Our friendly Hemnet culture fosters a dynamic, playful environment where every voice is valued. Here, you’ll join a welcoming team that encourages you to thrive and grow, working alongside passionate colleagues from around the world.
   

  

**A Hybrid Way of Working** 
  

  

 Our vibrant office in central Stockholm is the hub of our collaboration and culture, providing a lively space that fosters team spirit. We come together in the office three days a week, with two flexible remote days. To be part of our team, it’s essential to be based in or near Stockholm.

title: Integration Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Role:**
* create technical solution design for integration projects;
* implement, test and document integration solutions;
* contribute to continuous improvement of integration platform on-premise and in the cloud;
* work closely with business analysts and IT Architects in different projects;
* develop and maintain integrations using SAP Business Technology Platform Integration Suite (SAP BTP IS);
* support to prepare the Integration Competence Center team to upskill and learn about SAP BTP IS development;
* review and document integration patterns in SAP BTP IS to standardize them for future use; and enable self-service and end-to-end monitoring capabilities in SAP BTP IS, if technically possible.


****Essential requirements:****
* Proficiency in SAP Integration Suite (SAP IS)
* Experience with cloud-based solutions and integration of SAP and non-SAP systems
* Experience with monitoring tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, or similar
* Familiarity with self-service tools and automation
* Understanding about Seeburger and how to build a performant, secure and highly available platform
* Ability to analyze and resolve integration issues, ensuring smooth operation of the integration suite
* Strong communication and collaboration skills
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team


**Last day to apply** 
 : 28-09-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Java developer
description:
**Är du en erfaren Javautvecklare som söker nya utmaningar?**
 Hos B3 Innovation får du möjligheten att arbeta i en miljö där innovation och samarbete står i fokus. Vi söker dig med djup kunskap inom Java och som trivs i en dynamisk och inkluderande arbetsmiljö.
   

  

**Om rollen som Javautvecklare på B3 Innovation**
 Som utvecklare hos oss kommer du att:
   

  

* Utveckla högkvalitativa och skalbara lösningar.
* Samarbeta med ett tvärfunktionellt team av experter.
* Delta i design och arkitektur av nya system.


**Om dig**
 Vi söker dig som har god erfarenhet och arbetat som utvecklare under en längre tid. Du som har hunnit både göra misstag och även lära av dem. Förhoppningsvis tycker du om att arbeta i team, dela med dig av dina kunskaper och vill fortsätta att lära dig nytt.
   

  

 Våra krav för att du ska passa i denna roll:
   

  

* Du behärskar svenska i tal och skrift.
* Du har minst 5 års erfarenhet av Javautveckling.
* Du har god kunskap att jobba med Java, Kotlin, Spring, Microservices (gärna i CI/CD-miljö)
* Du har god kunskap att jobba med olika ramverk som React, Angular och Vue.
* Du har ett öga för detaljer och brinner för att leverera kvalitativa lösningar.
* Du är bekväm med moderna utvecklingsmetoder som Agile och DevOps.
* Har du dessutom kunskaper inom Techlead blir vi extra glada!


 Varför B3 Innovation?
   

  

* Innovativ Kultur: Vi uppmuntrar kreativitet och nya idéer.
* Inkluderande miljö: Vi värdesätter mångfald och strävar efter en arbetsplats där alla känner sig välkomna.
* Balans och flexibilitet: Flexibilitet är centralt, vilket gör att du kan forma din arbetsdag för att få livspusslet att gå ihop. Vi förstår vikten av balans mellan arbete och fritid och erbjuder därför flexibla arbetstider.
* Gemenskap: Hos oss blir du en del av ett stöttande team som arbetar tillsammans för att nå gemensamma mål. Det handlar inte bara om “jobb jobb jobb” hos oss. Vi anordnar allt från tech-workshops till sociala aktiviteter som stickcaféer, spelkvällar och AW.


**Om B3 Innovation**
 Vi är kända för vårt fokus på innovation och förmåga att leverera värde till våra kunder. Genom att kombinera djup teknisk expertis med en stark förståelse för våra kunders verksamhet, skapar vi lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad. Vår kultur bygger på öppenhet, samarbete och en passion för teknik.
   

  

 Vi prioriterar personlig utveckling och erbjuder verktyg som B3 Academy, TechTalks och "Lunch & Learn" för att du ska kunna växa.
   

  

 Upptäck möjligheterna med B3 Innovation. Som utvecklare får du arbeta inom spännande branscher som media, bank och finans, energi, offentlig sektor, telekom och e-handel. Oavsett om du optimerar TV-sändningar, utvecklar digitala banktjänster eller skapar smarta hem, hjälper vi dig att hitta det perfekta uppdraget som matchar dina intressen.
   

  

 Våra toppbetyg i medarbetarundersökningar visar att nöjda kollegor är kärnan i vår framgång. Är du redo att kliva in i en miljö där utveckling och trivsel går hand i hand?
   

  

 Som sagt, välkommen till B3 Innovation – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Är du redo att ta nästa steg?**
 Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt engagerade och innovativa team!
   

  

 Om du är mer nyfiken på oss så kan du läsa mer om oss här: https://www.b3.se/innovation
   

  

 Om du har funderingar så hör gärna av dig till Kenneth Andersson på +46706678050 alternativt mail kenneth.andersson@b3.se

title: Staff Software Engineer – Front End (Singapore Based)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

 Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel
   

  

 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

 The Opportunity:
   

  

 Join a forward-thinking team dedicated to transforming the customer experience through intelligent conversational AI solutions. Our mission is to streamline the user pre-booking journey by developing bots that address customer queries with precision, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free booking process. Working closely with product managers, designers, and engineers, we focus on continuous innovation to deliver solutions that meet customer needs and drive business success.
   

  

 Project Description:
   

  

 This project is centered on building advanced customer-facing AI-powered bots that elevate user experiences across multiple platforms. These bots are designed to simplify the pre-booking journey by providing quick, accurate responses to customer inquiries. By combining cutting-edge technology with a deep understanding of user behavior, the team ensures the bots are intuitive, efficient, and aligned with business goals.
   

  

 What you’ll Need to Succeed:
   

  

* At least 8 years of experience of extensive background in front-end development, working with client-side frameworks on large-scale applications (React is highly preferred).
* Strong core front-end skill set in JavaScript and the TypeScript ecosystem.
* Strong architecture skills and drive decision-making in the team.
* Experience working with component libraries.
* Strong product sense and a passion for client-side performance optimization.
* Demonstrated ability to drive changes and impact across various teams.
* Love collaborating via code reviews and architecture discussions and is motivated to improve their teammates’ productivity.


 It's Great if you have:
   

  

* Machine Learning, GPT, prompt engineering and other AI project experience
* Candidates with JVM language experience - Scala/Kotlin/Java and Python would be preferred


 This position is based in Singapore (MUST be a CITIZEN or PR of Singapore, no visa sponsorship) - No relocation provided
   

  

 #singapore #sanfrancisco #sanjose #losangeles #sandiego #oakland #denver #miami #orlando #atlanta #chicago #boston #detroit #newyork #portland #philadelphia #dallas #houston #austin #seattle #london #manchester #edinburgh #sydney #melbourne #perth #hongkong #shanghai #beijing #shenzhen #tokyo #osaka #berlin #munich #hamburg #stuttgart #cologne #frankfurt #paris #zurich #toronto #vancouver #montreal #amsterdam #dublin #stockholm #barcelona #madrid #seoul #taipei
   

  

 Equal Opportunity Employer
   

  

 At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy.
   

  

 Disclaimer
   

  

 We do not accept any terms or conditions, nor do we recognize any agency’s representation of a candidate, from unsolicited third-party or agency submissions. If we receive unsolicited or speculative CVs, we reserve the right to contact and hire the candidate directly without any obligation to pay a recruitment fee.

title: Backend Developer – Video Streaming & Content Delivery Network
description:
*Do you want to play a key role in building the digital backbone of the Nordics? At GlobalConnect, we are looking for a Backend Developer to join our Content Delivery Network team in Stockholm. You will be part of a dedicated group that delivers video and content distribution services to millions of people across Denmark, Norway, Finland, and Sweden.*
**About The Role**
 As a Backend Developer in our Video Streaming & Content Delivery team, you will design, develop, and implement solutions that support large-scale video and radio distribution. You will work in an agile team with experienced colleagues, close to stakeholders across development, operations, and customer support. The role combines technical depth with real customer impact, ensuring reliability, scalability, and efficiency in systems that matter.
   

  

 While our focus is on Content Delivery Network and video streaming technologies, you do not need previous experience in this field. If you bring solid backend development skills and curiosity, we will help you grow into the domain.
   

  

**Why this matters?**
 GlobalConnect is the digital backbone of society in the Nordics and northern Germany. Our CDN & Origin services enable leading broadcasters, media houses, and partners to distribute content on a scale. By joining us, you will help safeguard connectivity and deliver streaming experiences that millions of people rely on every day.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain backend systems for video and radio encoding, packaging, and distribution
* Contribute to the design and scaling of GlobalConnect’s CDN and origin services
* Collaborate closely with other development teams, network and datacenter colleagues, and support functions
* Troubleshoot, optimize, and maintain services in production
* Work in an agile setup with freedom under responsibility


**What You Need To Succeed**
* Minimum 3 years of experience as a backend developer (Java preferred)
* Knowledge of distributed systems and network protocols (TCP/IP, HTTP)
* Skills in at least one systems-oriented programming language (C, C++)
* Solid knowledge of GNU/Linux, including configuration and troubleshooting


**Good to have**
 Experience with big data (Hadoop ecosystem or similar), SQL/NoSQL databases, streaming protocols (HLS, DASH, SRT/MPEG-TS, RTMP), CI/CD, load testing, Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ, or automation tools such as Ansible, Puppet, or Chef.
   

  

 Swedish language skills are a plus.
   

  

**The team and why GlobalConnect**
 You will join a team of 16 specialists, including five developers, who have worked together for many years. The team values collaboration, autonomy, and close customer relationships. We are proud to serve more than 120 customers, including some of the most recognized media companies in the Nordics. At Globalconnect, you will experience a culture of trust, learning, and proactivity.
   

  

**Process**
 We review applications continuously. A CV is enough; a cover letter is not required unless you want to highlight something not covered in your CV or LinkedIn.
   

  

**Join us**
 If you want to help shape the digital backbone of the Nordics and work with systems that truly matter, we look forward to your application.
   

  

**About Us**
 GlobalConnect is one of the leading connectivity providers in Northern Europe. We’re 2000 passionate and talented individuals who want to make a difference, turning our customers’ visions into reality through connectivity. Our goal is to create the best possible conditions for engaged employees, a place where you can develop and grow, and create unforgettable memories and enjoyable experiences.
   

  

 We have helped develop and digitize societies across the Nordics for more than two decades. Our purpose is what drives us to continue - turning visions into reality by empowering society with connectivity.

title: Experienced NetSuite Developer – build the future of ERP at Aimo
description:
*We have embarked upon a journey where we are rethinking how parking can influence mobility and simplify people’s everyday lives. We want to become a vital part of the transition toward smarter cities and more environmentally friendly* 
 transports, where parking is no longer a final destination, but part of the journey.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Are you ready to take full ownership of a company’s NetSuite setup and drive real business impact? At Aimo Park, we're looking for a
 **senior NetSuite developer** 
 who’s not just comfortable with SuiteScript and system integrations – but excited to shape how we use technology to scale.
   

  

 You’ll join a fast-growing company with a clear purpose and work at the heart of our operations, collaborating across Finance, Operations, and IT. This is a hands-on role where your expertise will directly influence how we automate, streamline, and grow.
   

  

 And if you’re ready to take the next step in your career, there’s a clear path toward a
 **Tech Lead** 
 position.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Build and maintain custom solutions in NetSuite using SuiteScript, JavaScript, and HTML
* Manage NetSuite administration – including roles, permissions, workflows, and automation
* Improve automation and reporting in NetSuite Finance
* Handle integrations between NetSuite and other systems (e.g., Salesforce, payment, logistics)
* Translate business needs into technical solutions that scale with the organization


**About You**
 You’re an experienced NetSuite developer who enjoys solving real business problems with clean, scalable code. You’re not just looking for another development gig – you want a role where you can take ownership, collaborate across departments, and make a measurable impact. You thrive in environments where things move quickly and where your input truly matters.
   

  

**Here’s What We Think You’ll Bring**
* 3+ years of hands-on experience with NetSuite development and administration
* Strong skills in SuiteScript, SuiteCloud Platform, JavaScript, and system integrations
* A structured, proactive approach and a genuine interest in how tech supports business goals
* Fluency in English


**Bonus If You Also Have**
* Experience with NetSuite–Salesforce integrations
* SuiteCloud Developer or Administrator certification
* Professional working proficiency in Swedish


 This role is located at our headquarters in
 **Stockholm** 
 , and you need to be able to be on-site when the business requires it.
   

  

**About Us**
 Aimo Park builds on over 60 years of experience in the parking industry, but our current journey began in 2019 when Sumitomo Corporation, a Fortune Global 500 company, acquired our operations in Sweden, Norway, and Finland. Our vision is to redefine mobility and position ourselves at the forefront of smart city solutions.
   

  

 We are the leading parking company in the Nordics, operating over 370,000 parking spots across 6,000 locations, with 800 employees and a turnover of 228 million euros. In addition to parking, we also operate Aimo Solutions, a car-sharing service supporting the shift toward more sustainable urban mobility.

title: Microsoft Power Platform Developer
description:
Det vi gör på Tech har en avgörande roll för att förverkliga Apotekets affärsstrategi. Vi vill vara en ledande aktör i vår bransch och samtidigt kunna möta de behov som uppstår i samband med de förändringar som sker inom Apoteket och i vår omvärld. Som utvecklare på Apoteket är du med på vårt uppdrag att bidra till en bättre hälsa för varje individ – och samhället som stort.
   

  

 Vi letar nu efter en person som kan kliva in i rollen som Microsoft Power Platform Developer, där du kommer att ha en avgörande roll i att realisera vår vision. Du kommer att arbeta i framkant med Microsoft och vara med och utveckla plattformen hos oss på Apoteket.
   

  

  

**Microsoft Power**
**Platform Developer på Apoteket**
 Vi på Apoteket är på vår resa med Microsoft 365-plattformen och ser en enorm potential för utveckling framåt. Med en stark efterfrågan på nya applikationer söker vi nu en Microsoft utvecklare som vill vara med och forma framtiden för plattformen hos oss.
   

  

 Du blir en del av ett team som idag består av sex utvecklare där du kommer ha möjlighet att vara med och påverka och styra vart vi ska ta vägen med Apotekets Microsoft-plattform. Du kommer att arbeta nära hela verksamheten för att förstå behov och utveckla lösningar som gör skillnad.
   

  

  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsområden**
* Designa, planera och utveckla avancerade lösningar i Power Apps, Power Automate och Copilot Studio
* Utveckla Canvas och Model Driven Apps för skräddarsydda affärsbehov
* Skapa integrationslösningar mellan Microsoft Stack-verktyg (M365, SQL, Dataverse) och externa system.
* Bygga custom connectors, cloud flows och desktop flows, samt utveckla lösningar med Copilot Studio-agenter
* Samarbeta med verksamhetskonsulter, projektledare och andra utvecklare och lösningsarkitekter
* Delta i kunddialoger och genomföra workshops och utbildningar


**Dina kompetenser**
 Vi letar efter dig som har en stark samarbetsförmåga och trivs med att arbeta nära både verksamheten och Tech. Du är analytisk, strukturerad och brinner för att leverera god kvalité i ditt arbete.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har en hög grad nyfikenhet av ny teknik och en tydlig kommunikationsstil, vilket gör att du kan dela med dig av kunskap, inspirera och engagera dina kollegor.
   

  

  

**Utöver detta vill vi att du har**
* Högskoleutbildning inom datavetenskap, teknik, matematik eller motsvarande kunskap genom arbetslivserfarenhet
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet som utvecklare inom IT-industrin med fokus på MS SharePoint och/eller Power Platform
* Du innehar certifikat inom PL-900 - Power Platform Fundamentals & MS-900 - Microsoft 365 Fundamentals
* Erfarenhet av utveckling med M365-teknologier, inklusive SPFx, samt PowerShell scripting för M365 management
* Erfarenhet av integrationer med olika Microsoft Stack-verktyg och externa system
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


 Det är meriterande om du tidigare arbetat med Power BI, Copilot Studio, React.js och SharePoint Framework.
   

  

  

**När det känns rätt**
 Fundera inte för länge. Låt oss i stället berätta om rollen och om verksamheten så kan du sen avgöra om det känns rätt för dig. Ansök nu!
   

  

 Vi vill att din ansökan består av ditt CV samt svar på våra urvalsfrågor. Du behöver alltså inte skicka med ett personligt brev. Urvalsfrågorna hjälper oss att bättre förstå din erfarenhet och dina kvalifikationer för den aktuella rollen och öka vår träffsäkerhet.
   

  

 Urval och intervjuer sker löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum.
   

  

  

**Välkommen till Apoteket!**

title: Lead Software Engineer – Front End/Full Stack (Singapore Based)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration.  We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Working closely with product managers, designers, and engineers, we focus on continuous innovation to deliver solutions that meet customer needs and drive business success.

 What you’ll Need to Succeed:
   

  

* 12+ years of software development experience in building large-scale web applications, with a minimum of 3 years in a Tech Lead or equivalent leadership role
* Proven experience designing, building, improving, and operating high-performance, scalable front-end systems
* Extensive experience with client-side technologies & modern frameworks (e.g., JavaScript, TypeScript, React)
* Strong architecture skills and the ability to drive decision-making within and across teams
* Experience working with component libraries and a passion for client-side performance optimization
* Demonstrated ability to mentor and grow Senior and Staff engineers through thorough and convincing communication
* Provides technical direction within and across groups by leading projects and building systems with company-wide impact
* Strong understanding of the business and how their systems impact the bottom line; able to redirect the team based on business priorities
* Eager to work in multiple programming languages and frameworks, constantly striving to raise technical excellence
* Constantly read and learn, moving Agoda forward technically, influencing other teams, and proactively improving others


 It's Great if you have:
   

  

* Experience with Machine Learning, GPT, prompt engineering, or other AI projects
* Knowledge of JVM languages (Scala/Kotlin/Java) and Python
* Knowledge of physical architecture at scale, building resilience and highly available solutions
* Strong experience in all aspects of client-side performance optimization
* Proficiency in modern coding and design practices (e.g., Clean Code, SOLID principles, TDD)
* Knowledge of back-end technologies and how they integrate with front-end systems


 This position is based in Singapore (MUST be a CITIZEN or PR of Singapore, no visa sponsorship) - No relocation provided
   

  

 #singapore #sanfrancisco #sanjose #losangeles #sandiego #oakland #denver #miami #orlando #atlanta #chicago #boston #detroit #newyork #portland #philadelphia #dallas #houston #austin #seattle #london #manchester #edinburgh #sydney #melbourne #perth #hongkong #shanghai #beijing #shenzhen #tokyo #osaka #berlin #munich #hamburg #stuttgart #cologne #frankfurt #paris #zurich #toronto #vancouver #montreal #amsterdam #dublin #stockholm #barcelona #madrid #seoul #taipei
